recommended_degree: Administrasi, Administrasi Bisnis, Psikologi, Manajemen (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description:
1. Help prepare and organize employee documents (contracts, letters, etc.). 
2. Support the team in daily HR administrative tasks.
3. Assist in responding to simple employee queries.
4. Support administrative tasks related to employee benefit & expatriate documentation.
5. Assist in designing attractive and clear HR communication materials (e.g., posters, announcements, internal newsletters).
